|rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "CA804.00A" is silkscreened on the board. Per the manual, the device is running Linux (kernel ver. 2.4.18). ==Links of Interest== [http://www.atel.com.pl/produkt.php?hash=05375 Product page] :[http://www.atel.com.pl/doc/05375i_v_1_0_www.pdf Manual (PL)] :[http://www.atel.com.pl/doc/05375ie.pdf Manual (EN)] ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts====
